name: Baby Monster Delivery
description:
The games is made for the Ludum Dare 46. 

The theme of this game jam is "Keep it Alive". And what other way to keep alive are cute little monsters.

You are a flying pan delivering the monster baby to their mother over lava and boobytraps.

Try to get as many babies as save as possible to their home.

PLayable on Keyboard and controller.
